Scriptal.Name: Set Route
Scriptal.Description: Immediately sets the patrol route of a specific Game Object. Compatible with Soldiers, Helicopters, UAVs and Prisoners. Soldiers and Helicopters will transition back to their defined sneak/caution route when prompted by their command post. UAVs and Prisoners will retain this route across both sneak and caution phases. Note: For most events, 'arg1' represents the GameObjectId that sent the event. Note: This operation will set Prisoners to a walkable state (not force-scared, force-downed, or unlocked). Untied prisoners will become tied again.

Choice.Name: Game Object
Choice.Description: The soldier/helicopter/UAV/Prisoner (their name or GameObjectId) to be re-routed

Choice.Name: New Route
Choice.Description: The name of the route that the target Game Object will begin to patrol.
